fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NO. 4011, LEVEL 4, IFC MALL, 8 FINANCE STREET, CENTRAL, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港中環金融街8號國際金融中心商場第4層4011號舖

geocode_en.formatted_address: Shop 4011, Podium Level 4, ifc Mall, 8 Finance St, Central, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: Shop 4011, Podium Level 4, ifc Mall, 8 Finance St, Central, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Shop 4011, Podium Level 4, ifc Mall, 8 Finance St, Central, Hong Kong
result.name: PONG IFC

reviews.text: Had lunch there today. Nice enviorment, service still considered alright, FOOD WAS AWFUL. I would expect something decent at $200 for lunch. But no, there was reheated frozen dim sum and main dishes were no no no.

Fun place for casual drinks with friends or colleagues.
The view on the harbor is nice and the outdoor space enjoyable in summer.
Large choice of drinks. Snacks are excellent.

Slightly bizarre bar with two electronic beer pong tables. Food options mostly fried bar snacks but surprisingly good wine by glass. Inside tables have bar service but outside tables are counter service. Recommended if all the other rooftop bars are full.

Nice view, terrible service.

Situating at the roof top of IFC, with nice music and view, you'd think that their cocktail and service would be on point too. Well...Think Again.

We were told that in order to sit outdoor, we need to order inside first, sure no problem. After we made our order, the waiter gave us a beeper (the kind of device you get at food court to notify you to get your food when it's ready), and told us to go in to get our drinks when it beeps.

When we walked in to get our drinks, we were handed a tray with 4 cups of full cocktail (exactly the tray shown in the pic) and we were expected to take the drinks back out there ourselves.

With such pricing and location, you'd think you can at least get a bit of servicing, but frankly any bars we have been to can beat this. Actually even Tam Jai has better service than this lol.
Great service, games and amazing view !

result.vicinity: Shop 4011, Podium Level 4, ifc Mall, 8 Finance Street, Central

result.adr_address: 8 Finance St, Central, Hong Kong
result.name: ifc mall

reviews.text: ifc is probably one of the best malls in Hong Kong. With the wide variety of food and the even wider variety of clothing, this makes the mall a comfortable and one of the best malls. The train station is also located near the mall for easier access and convenient travel. Would definitely recommend to tourists and travelers.

Huge open shopping mall with plenty of restaurants and great connections throughout Hong Kong be they ferry, train, buses or even the airport express. There are plenty of open areas, including the rooftop area which is reserved for restaurants and bars. The area has a luxury vibe at a corresponding price tag.
Probably one of my favorite malls in the world. You can find here basically anything, from Shake Shack, to cold-pressed juices, clothing stores, Apple, electronics and much more.

Hong Kong is full of places like this. Shopping mall stuffed with expensive brands, an Apple store and a cinema. There is a city super and if you want a decent coffee go to fuel. It also has a music shop with a pretty good selection of new vinyl. Best thing to do here? Buy some beers from city super or nearby marks and Spencers and head up to the Mall roof top garden and watch Kowloon as the sun goes down, or a storm is coming in. Pretty awesome.
Excellent mall, just above the Hong Kong train station. Has excellent options for shopping and food which includes all varieties. Overall excellent place.

result.adr_address: 香港中環金融街8號
result.name: 國際金融中心

reviews.text: 好👌

시티슈퍼 과일 입구쪽에
한8시쯤가면 과일잘라논거 세일하는데용
노란메론 잘라논거 맛있어요
이번엔 좀 덜달았지만 .....그래도 맛나요
제일 안쪽으로 들어오면 육포코너 있는데
이거 드셔보세요 부드럽고 적당이 짭짤해서
맥주안주로 굿 !!! 맥주도 한국처럼 다양해용
즐거운 여행되세영

Central Ferry Pier앞의 금융복합단지..
국내 여의도와 마찬가지로 수많은 금융산업이 모여있고, 레스토랑과 쇼핑몰이 즐비하다..단..대부분의 물품들은 국내보다 가격이 저렴하지 않다..
옥상에는 따로 야외 가든이 있으나..무덥다..낮보다는 밤에..
홍콩의 밤은...당신의 낮보다 화려하닌깐...

Nice view, terrible service.

Situating at the roof top of IFC, with nice music and view, you'd think that their cocktail and service would be on point too. Well...Think Again.

We were told that in order to sit outdoor, we need to order inside first, sure no problem. After we made our order, the waiter gave us a beeper (the kind of device you get at food court to notify you to get your food when it's ready), and told us to go in to get our drinks when it beeps.
